info.title: AeroDB API
info.summary: The AeroDB API provides access to a wide range of aeronautical data.
info.description:
## General Information

- All properties are **always returned** and **must be provided**,
but can be `null` if not applicable.
- Some endpoints require **authentication via API key**.

## Filtering, Sorting & Offset

Certain endpoints support **filtering**, **sorting**, and **offset** to control and refine list results.

### Query Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Default | Description |
|------------|-------|----------|--------------|
| `limit` | `int32` | `100` | Maximum number of items per page. Cannot exceed **300**. |
| `offset` | `int32` | `0` | Number of items to skip before starting to collect results. |
| `filter` | `string` (Base64) | — | Base64-encoded JSON object defining filtering conditions. |
| `sort` | `string` (Base64) | — | Base64-encoded JSON object defining sorting order. |

---

### Filtering Example

You can filter airports by one or more properties using a **Base64-encoded JSON filter**.

#### JSON before encoding:
```json
{
  "AND": [
    {
      "countryCode": {
        "in": ["ES"]
      }
    }
  ]
}
```

#### Base64 encoded:
```
eyJBTkQiOlt7ImNvdW50cnlDb2RlIjp7ImluIjpbIkVTIl19fV19
```

#### Final request:
> /airports?limit=50&offset=0&filter=eyJBTkQiOlt7ImNvdW50cnlDb2RlIjp7ImluIjpbIkVTIl19fV19

---

### Sorting Example

You can define multiple sort rules, each specifying a property and direction (`asc` or `desc`).

#### JSON before encoding:
```json
{
  "sort": [
    { "name": "asc" },
    { "city": "desc" }
  ]
}
```

#### Base64 encoded:
```
eyJzb3J0IjpbeyJuYW1lIjoiYXNjIn0seyJjaXR5IjoiZGVzYyJ9XX0=
```

#### Final request:
> /airports?limit=20&sort=eyJzb3J0IjpbeyJuYW1lIjoiYXNjIn0seyJjaXR5IjoiZGVzYyJ9XX0=

---

### Combined Example

You can combine **filter**, **sort**, **limit**, and **offset** in a single request.

> /airports?limit=100&offset=200&filter=eyJBTkQiOlt7ImNvdW50cnlDb2RlIjp7ImluIjpbIkVTIl19fV19&sort=eyJzb3J0IjpbeyJuYW1lIjoiYXNjIn0seyJjaXR5IjoiZGVzYyJ9XX0=

This will return up to **100 Spanish airports**, skipping the first **200**, sorted by **name (asc)** then **city (desc)**.

---

## Rate Limiting

- The API enforces a per-IP rate limit of approximately **10 requests per second**.
- Exceeding this limit returns a `429 Too Many Requests` response.

Use these headers to monitor your current rate limit status:

- `X-Ratelimit-Limit`
- `X-Ratelimit-Remaining`
- `X-Ratelimit-Reset-Ms`

---

© AeroDB — All rights reserved.

post.description:
Invalidate the previous validation token and send a new one.

- Send an email to the user with a password reset link.

- The new reset token will be valid for 1 hour.

- Previous validation token requests must be at least 15 minutes old.

- User must be authenticated.

400.description: The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax.

post.description:
Invalidate the previous validation token and send a new one to the user's email.

- Send an email to the user with a verification link.

- User must NOT be verified already.

- The new verification token will be valid for 1 hour.

- Previous verification token requests must be at least 15 minutes old.

400.description: The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax.

post.description: Update the user password using a valid reset token.

400.description: The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax.

post.description: Verify the user account using the verification token sent via email.

400.description: The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax.

get.description:
Return a list of Airlines

If unauthenticated, the result is limited to 5 items.

schema.description: Represents a paginated list of items.

404.description: The server cannot find the requested resource.

schema.description: Represents a paginated list of items.

get.description:
List airports with minimal details.

*Limit on this operation is increased*

Get a unique airport by its identifier.

This operation retreive additional information, including its runways and frequencies.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Airport Identifier , can be the id, ICAO code or IATA code

404.description: The server cannot find the requested resource.

get.description: *Limit on this operation is increased to 500*

schema.description: Represents a paginated list of items.

404.description: The server cannot find the requested resource.

get.description: Get the current user based on the provided JWT.

400.description: The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax.

get.description:
Return a list of NOTAMs

If unauthenticated, the result is limited to 5 items.

schema.description: Represents a paginated list of items.

404.description: The server cannot find the requested resource.

post.description:
Return a user account based on a valid OAuth token from a provider based on the user's email.

If the user does not exist, a new account is created with a generated password.

The provider will be linked to the user account for future logins.

Return 404 if no user is found with the email provided by the OAuth provider.

Return 401 if the OAuth token is invalid or expired.

404.description: The server cannot find the requested resource.

post.description: Request a new JWT using a refresh token.

201.description: The request has succeeded and a new resource has been created as a result.

400.description: The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax.

ListParameters.filter.name: filter
ListParameters.filter.description: Base64-encoded filter expression to apply to the list.

ListParameters.limit.name: limit
ListParameters.limit.description: Maximum number of items to return per page.

ListParameters.sort.name: sort
ListParameters.sort.description: Base64-encoded sort expression to apply to the list.

UnlimitedListParameters.name: limit
UnlimitedListParameters.description: Maximum number of items to return per page.

CurrentUser.description: User as visible by it's owner's session (/me endpoint).

countryCode.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code of the airline's primary country.

fleetSize.description: Number of aircraft in the airline's fleet.

operationStartDate.description: Date when the airline started operations.

operationEndDate.description: Date when the airline ceased operations.

countryCode.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code of the airline's primary country.

fleetSize.description: Number of aircraft in the airline's fleet.

operationStartDate.description: Date when the airline started operations.

operationEndDate.description: Date when the airline ceased operations.

icaoCode.description: ICAO airport code, a four-letter alphanumeric code

iataCode.description: IATA airport code, a three-letter alphanumeric code

isVFR.description: Indicates if the airport is VFR (Visual Flight Rules) capable

isIFR.description: Indicates if the airport is IFR (Instrument Flight Rules) capable

pprRequired.description: Indicates if prior permission is required for landing

icaoCode.description: ICAO airport code, a four-letter alphanumeric code

iataCode.description: IATA airport code, a three-letter alphanumeric code

isVFR.description: Indicates if the airport is VFR (Visual Flight Rules) capable

isIFR.description: Indicates if the airport is IFR (Instrument Flight Rules) capable

pprRequired.description: Indicates if prior permission is required for landing

isSnowtam.description:
Indicates if the NOTAM is a SNOWTAM.
A SNOWTAM (Snow and/or Ice NOTAM) is a special type of NOTAM (Notice to Airmen) issued by an airport to provide pilots with critical information about hazardous conditions on the movement area (runways and taxiways) caused by snow, ice, slush, frost, or standing water

isProcedure.description: Indicates if the NOTAM is related to a procedure.

isSnowtam.description:
Indicates if the NOTAM is a SNOWTAM.
A SNOWTAM (Snow and/or Ice NOTAM) is a special type of NOTAM (Notice to Airmen) issued by an airport to provide pilots with critical information about hazardous conditions on the movement area (runways and taxiways) caused by snow, ice, slush, frost, or standing water

isProcedure.description: Indicates if the NOTAM is related to a procedure.
